about_the_game:
Floods, raging hurricanes, and weather anomalies cause great havoc around the globe. People are forced to leave their homesteads. Each day becomes a challenge and a fight for survival.

Sarah wakes up in a different world. She realizes, that she is alone in a completely abandoned city, still bustling yesterday. Her daughter is missing. Her life and world have changed in one day.

Will she find the strength to survive... to live?



Trust no one

In the world of “The Day After” you won’t be the only survivor. That’s why you have to be extremely cautious when interacting with strangers and judging the situation. Remember, these days everyone has something to lose!



Stay aware

Stay alarmed and watch out for dangers that are waiting for you behind every corner.
Animals, sicknesses, and much more will lurk in the world of The Day After and wait for your first wrong step! Remember to have eyes all around you.



Never give up

The main threat in the game will be weather anomalies. You will have to constantly stay in motion and search every nook and corner for shelter and supplies.
